text: when you go to Mars the atmosphere isn't
breathable it's got oxygen in it but
it's and it's got carbon dioxide to the
gases that are in our atmosphere but
they're not at all in the same
proportions so you can't actually
breathe the atmosphere on Mars in
science fiction we do talk about
something called terraforming which is
could we change the atmosphere of Mars
and actually make it breathable like the
atmosphere here on the earth scientists
have written papers about it but it's a
pretty tough go and it would take at
least hundreds of thousands of years so
that's pretty far off in the future when
our astronauts make it to the surface of
Mars they're going to have to live in a
pressurized habitat where we create an
atmosphere that is breathable and when
they go outside they're going to have to
take oxygen tanks with them so that they
can safely breathe now this is always a
challenge because we breathe out carbon
dioxide we breathe in oxygen and so the
more we breathe out carbon dioxide too
much carbon dioxide gets in any enclosed
space in fact a challenge we have on the
international space station is actually
keeping the carbon dioxide levels low
enough so that it doesn't give the
astronauts headaches so this will be a
challenge on Mars it's been a challenge
on the International Space Station but
NASA is working hard on it so that when
we're ready to get astronauts to Mars in
the early 2030s we're going to have this
problem sorted
